name: AutoHotkey Mini-projects
short_description:
I thought it was about time to get some safe space online to store some of my scripts to avoid losing them when another hard drive goes AWOL.

Scripts here may or may not be in working condition, may or may not be useful, may or may not contain any kind of useful documentation/comments, and may or may not be well coded.

Anyone may download, use and modify these scripts to suit their own needs, and anyone who downloads them SHOULD modify them in order to make them suit their own needs.

Should you publish your own scripts more or less based on my code, I would appreciate appropriate credits. Mostly because it helps me realize what I've made that is of use to others.

That being said, these scripts are not recommended for human consumption. By using these scripts, you acknowledge that you take full responsibility for any damage these script cause to you, your computer, your neighbor or your pet(s).

Have fun!
---
"God is real unless declared integer"
summary: My Personal Collection of AutoHotkey scripts
